metadata.name: Lighthouse by Sigma Prime
metadata.description:
Lighthouse is an Ethereum consensus-layer client. We provide a stable, performant and open-source implementation which is relied upon by a significant portion of the Ethereum network.

We're actively engaged in research, specification and implementation. Providing a safe and scalable base-layer is our commitment and passion.

metadata.name: The old lighthouse
metadata.description: The old lighthouse stood tall and steadfast against the wind and waves, a beacon of light guiding ships through the darkest, stormiest nights. Its white tower weathered by decades of salty air, the paint peeled and chipped to reveal the sturdy bricks underneath. The glass of the lantern room still glinted in the sunlight, sending reflections dancing across the sea. Inside, a winding staircase circled up to the catwalk, the iron railing worn smooth by generations of lighthouse keepers. In the small living quarters downstairs, faded curtains blew in the ocean breeze, framing views of the churning sea and sky. As the sunset painted the cliffs in golds and pinks, the lighthouse lamp flickered to life, ready to keep its watchful vigil once again when darkness fell. Though battered by time, it remained as steadfast as the coastline it guarded, guiding mariners home.

metadata.name: The solitary lighthouse
metadata.description: The solitary lighthouse stood against the brooding sky, a lonely sentinel on the rocky outcrop. Rain pattered against the salt-weathered stone walls, running in little rivulets down into the churning sea below. Though the storm raged, the lamp's flame burned steady and true behind thick glass panes. Tucked within the tower, the lighthouse keeper went quietly about his duties, checking the rotating lens and wiping away condensation to keep the beacon clear. Thunder cracked and boomed outside but he was unfazed, having weathered many such storms before. Through the night he remained, ensuring the unwavering glow cut through the dark and warned ships away from the jagged reefs. As dawn broke, tinting the clouds pink and gold, the rains ceased and the ocean calmed once more. The lighthouse had guided mariners through the night, its light burning as a symbol of hope until day returned.
